entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

Application Description

ËøôÊòØ‰∏ÄÊ¨æÂÖ≥‰∫éÁîü„ÄÅÊ≠ª„ÄÅÂøÉÊÑø‰∏éÂª∂Áª≠ÁöÑApp„ÄÇ Â∞èÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÊàë‰ª•‰∏∫Ëá™Â∑±ÊòØ‰∏ç‰ºöËÄÅÂéªÁöÑÂΩºÂæó¬∑ÊΩòÔºåÂç¥ÁªàÁ©∂Êïå‰∏çËøáÂÅ•Â∫∑Á£®ÊçüÔºåÂÆπÈ¢úËÄÅÂéª„ÄÇ Êó∂ÈíàËΩ¨Âä®ÔºåÁîüÂëΩÊµÅÈÄùÔºå‰ΩÜÊØè‰∏ÄÊ¨°ÂøÉË∑≥ÈÉΩÂèØ‰ª•Êõ¥Âä†ÊúâÂäõ„ÄÇ ÊúâÊó∂ÂÄôÔºåÁîüÂëΩÂè™ÊòØ‰∏ÄËøû‰∏≤ÁöÑÊï∞Â≠óÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂπ¥ÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÊúàÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂ∞èÊó∂ÔºåÂ§öÂ∞ëÂàÜÈíü„ÄÇÂΩì‰Ω†ÊÑèËØÜÂà∞Ëøô‰∏™Êó∂ÔºåÂæÄÂæÄÈô∑ÂÖ•Â∑®Â§ßÁöÑËôöÊó†ÊÑü‰πã‰∏≠ÔºåÊÉ∂ÊÅê‰∏çËÉΩËá™Êãî„ÄÇ ËÄåÁé∞Âú®ÔºåËøô‰∫õÊï∞Â≠óÂèØ‰ª•Êàê‰∏∫‰Ω†ÈáçÂ°ëÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÂùêÊ†áÔºåÊåáÂºï‰Ω†Ëµ∞ÂêëÊõ¥ÂÅ•Â∫∑„ÄÅÊõ¥Èïø‰πÖÁöÑÊú™Êù•„ÄÇ ÁîüËæ∞ 2.0 ÈÄöËøá AI ÂàÜÊûêÂíåÁßëÂ≠¶Âà§Êñ≠Ôºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÈ¢ÑÊµãÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÁªàÁÇπÔºåÊõ¥‰∏∫‰Ω†Èì∫Â∞±Âª∂ÈïøÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÈÅìË∑ØÔºö - Êé¢Á¥¢‰Ω†ÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÊó∂ÈíüÔºö‰∫ÜËß£ÂΩì‰∏ãÁöÑÈ¢ÑÊúüÂØøÂëΩÔºåÁõ¥Èù¢ÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÊúâÈôê‰∏éÁèçË¥µ„ÄÇ - ÂèëÁé∞Âª∂ÂØøÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÔºöÁúãËßÅÊîπÂèòÂÅ•Â∫∑‰π†ÊÉØËÉΩ‰∏∫‰Ω†Â∏¶Êù•Â§öÂ∞ëÈ¢ùÂ§ñÁöÑÁîüÂëΩÊó∂ÂÖâ„ÄÇ - ËÅöÂêàÂÅ•Â∫∑Êï∞ÊçÆÔºöËá™Âä®ËøΩË∏™Áù°Áú†„ÄÅÈîªÁÇº„ÄÅÂéãÂäõÔºàHRVÔºâ„ÄÅÁªèÊúü„ÄÅÂñùÊ∞¥Á≠âÂçÅ‰ΩôÁßçÂÅ•Â∫∑Êï∞ÊçÆ ÁæéÂõΩËØó‰∫∫Á∫≥¬∑ÊñØÂæÖÂ∞îÂú®87Â≤ÅÈÇ£Âπ¥ÂÜôÈÅìÔºö "Â¶ÇÊûúÊàëËÉΩÂ§ü‰ªéÂ§¥Ê¥ªËøáÔºåÊàë‰ºöËØïÁùÄÁäØÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÈîô„ÄÇ Êàë‰ºöÊîæÊùæ‰∏ÄÁÇπÔºåÊàë‰ºöÁÅµÊ¥ª‰∏ÄÁÇπ„ÄÇ Êàë‰ºöÁà¨Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑÂ±±ÔºåÊ∏∏Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑÊ≤≥ÔºåÁúãÊõ¥Â§öÁöÑÊó•ËêΩ„ÄÇ" Âõ†‰∏∫‰∫ÜËß£ÁîüÂëΩÁöÑÁªàÁÇπÔºåÊâçËÉΩÊõ¥Â•ΩÂú∞ÁèçÊÉúÂΩì‰∏ãÁöÑÊØè‰∏ÄÂàª„ÄÇÁîüËæ∞2.0 Êé¢Á¥¢ÂÅ•Â∫∑ÁöÑÂèØËÉΩÔºåËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨Êàê‰∏∫‰Ω†ÂÅ•Â∫∑ÊóÖÁ®ãÁöÑÈïø‰πÖ‰ºô‰º¥„ÄÇ „ÄêÁîüËæ∞ App ‰ºöÂëòÊúçÂä°ËØ¥Êòé„Äë 1.‰ºöÂëòÂåÖÂê´Âá†ÁßçËÆ¢Ë¥≠Á±ªÂûã ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®ÊúüÔºö1‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ3‰∏™Êúà„ÄÅ12‰∏™Êúà 2.È¶ñÊ¨°ËÆ¢Ë¥≠Âêé‰ºöÈÄöËøáiTunesË¥¶Êà∑Áõ¥Êé•ÊîØ‰ªòÔºõË¥¶Êà∑‰ºöÂú®Âà∞ÊúüÂâç24Â∞èÊó∂ÂÜÖÊâ£Ë¥πÔºåÊâ£Ë¥πÊàêÂäüÂêéËá™Âä®È°∫Âª∂‰∏Ä‰∏™ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂë®Êúü 3.Êú¨ÊúçÂä°Áî±ÊÇ®Ëá™‰∏ªÈÄâÊã©ÊòØÂê¶Áª≠ËÆ¢ÔºåÂ¶ÇÈúÄÂèñÊ∂àÔºåËØ∑Âú®ËÆ¢ÈòÖÂà∞Êúü24Â∞èÊó∂ÂâçÔºåÂú® AppleID ËÆæÁΩÆ‰∏≠ÂèñÊ∂à 4.ÁîüËæ∞App ‰ºöÂëòÂçèËÆÆ ÁîüËæ∞App ‰ºöÂëòÊúçÂä°ÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/ 5.ÁîüËæ∞App ËΩØ‰ª∂ÂçèËÆÆ‰∏éÈöêÁßÅÊîøÁ≠ñ ÁîüËæ∞ ËΩØ‰ª∂ËÆ∏ÂèØÂèäÊúçÂä°ÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/ ÁîüËæ∞ ÈöêÁßÅÂçèËÆÆÔºöhttps://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.99 ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions. Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world. How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune. Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff? You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again! Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you! Pump it up and chill ;) **************** Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers TD
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • BonehartÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]
  • Sha'traÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • GrawlÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $2.99]
  • AshbiteÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $6.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • SaitamÔºö$2.99
  • BonehartÔºö$4.99
  • Captain BlackthorneÔºö$0.99
  • Sha'traÔºö$0.99
  • NivusÔºö$0.99
  • GrawlÔºö$0.99
  • KahzÔºö$2.99
  • KarkinosÔºö$0.99
  • AshbiteÔºö$4.99
  • KutsaoÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Kingdom Rush Frontiers is a whole new level of the furiously fast, enchantingly charming gameplay that made kingdom Rush an award-winning Tower Defense hit. Defend exotic lands from dragons, man-eating plants, and ghastly denizens of the underworld -all with flashy towers, levels, heroes, and more goodies to help you crush your enemies to a pulp. BUILD MIGHTY TOWERS! ‚Ä¢ OVER 18 TOWER ABILITIES! Unleash Death Riders, pestilence clouds, or assassins that steal and kill your enemies! ‚Ä¢ 8 SPECIALIZED TOWER UPGRADES! Slice, sizzle, and stomp your foes with Crossbow Forts, Mighty Templars, Necromancers, and even Earthquake Machines - hey, we told you we were shaking things up. ‚Ä¢ UPGRADE SYSTEM allows you to min/max your towers towards your preferred strategy. ‚Ä¢ Fortify the frontier in exotic news lands - hold the line in deserts, jungles, and even the underworld! TRAIN LEGENDARY HEROES ‚Ä¢ 16 LEGENDARY HEROES. Choose among mighty champions and train their abilities! Each has unique specialties that fit different play styles and strategies! ‚Ä¢ Special units and features on every stage! Watch out for the Black Dragon! DEFEAT THEM ALL ‚Ä¢ OVER 40 ENEMIES with unique abilities! Stay on your toes as you fight through desert sandworms, tribal shamans, nomad tribes, and underground terrors. Action like you have never seen before! ‚Ä¢ MERCILESS BOSS FIGHTS! Hey, we told you to get those upgrades... MORE MIND-BOGGLING CONTENT ‚Ä¢ Hours of army with OVER 80 ACHIEVEMENTS! what can you expect from Ironhide Games, the creators of Kingdom rush? You will be hooked for hours searching for Easter eggs and achievements! ‚Ä¢ IN-GAME ENCYCLOPEDIA! learn all about your enemies and you will be able to plan the best strategy to defeat them. Study up! ‚Ä¢ CLASSIC, IRON, AND HEROIC GAME MODES to challenge your tactical skills! ‚Ä¢ 3 DIFFICULTY MODES! Are you up for a real challenge? Go with Hard mode! ‚Ä¢ PLAY IT OFFLINE! No internet? No problem! You will be able to jump into real action even offline! ----------------------------------------------------- PRAISE FOR KINGDOM RUSH: IGN Editor's Choice, Slide To Play Must Have, 148 Apps Editor's Choice, Jay is Games Game of the Year, Pocket Gamer Gold Award, Touch Arcade 4.5/5 Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy Video creators, podcast creators, and streamers: We would love to see your content on Youtube and Twitch! We support and promote channel creators so, if you want us to showcase your videos or want to know more about our games, feel free to write to us to contact@ironhidegames.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$27.99 ‚Üí $9.99 [$9.99 ~ $27.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$9.99

In-App Purchases

  • All-in-One PackÔºö$5.99
  • New Content! Magic CarpetÔºö$2.99
  • New Content! Astronomy SetÔºö$2.99
  • New Content! Pixel RingÔºö$2.99
  • Boss Monster Model SetÔºö$2.99

Application Description

Explore a world made of blocks as you gather, craft, and build to defeat the evil Dragonlord! Build everywhere from anywhere in DRAGON QUEST BUILDERS, available now on mobile. Brought to you by SQUARE ENIX! ‚óÜ TRAVEL AND EXPLORE THE VAST WORLD OF DRAGON QUEST! In this ‚ÄúBlock-Building RPG‚Äù, YOU are the legendary builder that has the power to build! The realm of Alefgard has been plunged into darkness by the terrible and treacherous Dragonlord, the ruler of all monsters. Venture off on the epic adventure to restore Alefgard! ‚óÜ FACE OFF AGAINST VICIOUS FOES! You will encounter Slimes, Golems, Dragons, and more. Familiar DRAGON QUEST monsters of all sizes threaten the survival of humankind! Craft weapons, build defenses, and fight the monsters to protect your base. Use your power to build and play smart when fighting against frightening enemies in action packed combat! ‚óÜ GATHER, CRAFT AND BUILD FROM ANYWHERE! In this world made of blocks, everything you see can be materials used to create! Farm ingredients, craft various items and build your base to unite the people roaming the ruins. From buildings to entire towns, you have the freedom to make your village your very own. The power to build is in the palm of your hands! ‚óÜ BUILD BETTER ON MOBILE WITH SPECIAL FEATURES ADDED! Place blocks by simply tapping the screen and destroy blocks and items more easily with specialized cursors. A convenient Undo Button function has also been added to allow you to restore your work! Convert your buildings in to Build Cards to share with friends and scan their buildings to have them show up in your island! ‚óÜ NEW DLC AS IN-APP PURCHASES New DLC added in ‚ÄúTerra Incognita,‚Äù the land where you can freely build and play! DLC includes: ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúMagic carpet‚Äù, ‚ÄúBoss figure pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúCelestial pack‚Äù, ‚ÄúDot ring‚Äù ‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúAll in one pack‚Äù (A set of the above 4) *Please be aware of duplicate purchases. "OS: iOS 13 or later iPhone 8 or later (minimum 3GB of RAM)" *Playing this game on a non-recommended device may result in unexpected errors, such as crashing due to insufficient memory. Please be aware that we may not be able to provide support for non-recommended devices.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: LP Helper Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$6.99

Application Description

"LP Helper Pro" is a permanent professional version of the "LP Helper" App. If you buy this version, you can use all professional functions permanently. "LP Helper Pro" includes four modules: map, on-site 3D compass, on-site AR and detailed information. Map - You can choose any position on the map and calculate the direction of the sun, moon, and the Milky Way at that location. You can also find a suitable location for shooting the starry sky through the light pollution map. In addition, we have added a new weather query function on the map. Now you can query the highly localized weather data of any location within 10 days, including weather, temperature, wind direction, wind speed, humidity, visual distance, cloud coverage and other information, accurate to every hour. 3D compass - calculate the direction of the sun, moon and galaxy at the specified location in the form of a 3D compass. Local AR--Use AR to intuitively estimate the position of the sun, moon and galaxy. This function is very practical to predict the composition in advance at the shooting site. On the AR interface, you can also simulate the star track under the specified exposure time. In this way, you can estimate the shooting time required in advance when taking star track photos. Detailed information -- lists various special moments of the day in the current location, as well as the function of the star calendar. In addition, you can also save the selected locations on the map and add various special moments to the calendar for automatic reminders. The time scroll bar at the bottom can switch between multi-clock modes to switch different time spans and help you select time more accurately. In addition, the App also integrates a variety of practical tools, such as depth-of-view calculator, star point calculator, star orbit calculator, and light brush. Privacy Statement: https://blog.csdn.net/syx151/article/details/143922426? Spm=1001.2014.3001.5501 License Agreement: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$4.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$4.99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
